data.comment: The match is underway in Leeds.
Ball safe as Leeds is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Arsenal at Elland Road.
Anthony Taylor signals a Arsenal throw-in in Leeds's half.
Throw-in Leeds.
In the minute 5, Arsenal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Arsenal drive forward but Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang is judged offside.
In Leeds Leeds attack through Raphinha. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 6, Anthony Taylor awards Arsenal a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Arsenal in their own half.
In the minute 10, Dani Ceballos of Arsenal gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Leeds goal kick.
Patrick Bamford gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leeds.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Leeds.
In Leeds a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Stuart Dallas is booked for the home team.
In the minute 17, Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Arsenal's Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang has run offside.
Jack Harrison (Leeds) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 19, Leeds drive upfield and Jack Harrison gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Arsenal defender.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Leeds.
Nicolas Pepe hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for Arsenal.
In the minute 22, Anthony Taylor awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Arsenal in the half of Leeds.
Arsenal's Dani Ceballos breaks free at Elland Road. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 24, It's a goal kick for the home team in Leeds.
Arsenal's Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Leeds have a goal kick.
In the minute 26, Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Leeds.
Leeds are coming forward and Raphinha gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Arsenal at Elland Road.
In the minute 28, Free kick Arsenal.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
In the minute 31, Leeds pushes forward through Patrick Bamford, whose finish on goal is saved.
Leeds's Ezgjan Alioski misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leeds.
In the minute 32, Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal's half?
Leeds are pushing forward but Stuart Dallas's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
In the minute 36, Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Arsenal in their own half.
In Leeds, Stuart Dallas of Leeds is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 38, Leeds are coming forward and Kalvin Phillips gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Arsenal have a goal kick.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 41, Mateusz Klich for Leeds gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Arsenal at Elland Road.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Leeds close to the penalty box.
In the minute 43, Leeds's Luke Ayling misses with an attempt on goal.
Anthony Taylor awards Arsenal a goal kick.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
In the minute 44, Nicolas Pepe of Arsenal gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Leeds at Elland Road.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Leeds.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Mikel Arteta (Arsenal) is making a first substitution, with Reiss Nelson replacing Willian.
In the minute 47, Arsenal have a goal kick.
Free kick for Arsenal in the half of Leeds.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 51, Nicolas Pepe (Arsenal) sees red and is sent off in Leeds!
Throw-in high up the field for Leeds in Leeds.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Kalvin Phillips for Leeds who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 57, Bukayo Saka is replacing Joseph Willock for Arsenal at Elland Road.
Arsenal to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
Throw-in Arsenal.
In the minute 59, Leeds's Kalvin Phillips looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Arsenal in their own half.
Arsenal's Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 60, It's a goal kick for the away team in Leeds.
Can Leeds capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Arsenal's half?
Anthony Taylor awards Arsenal a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Stuart Dallas of Leeds smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
Liam Cooper's header is off-target for Leeds.
In the minute 64, Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
Anthony Taylor signals a Arsenal throw-in in Leeds's half.
Can Arsenal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
In the minute 66, Anthony Taylor awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Arsenal at Elland Road.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Leeds close to the penalty box.
Anthony Taylor awards Arsenal a goal kick.
In the minute 71, Ball safe as Leeds is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The home team replace Luke Ayling with Rodrigo Moreno.
Leeds awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Leeds push forward at Elland Road and Raphinha gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Arsenal defence.
In the minute 73, Patrick Bamford (Leeds) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Leeds's Patrick Bamford attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Arsenal have a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Free kick Arsenal.
Arsenal's Granit Xhaka gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Leeds at Elland Road.
In the minute 76, Leeds's Rodrigo Moreno breaks free at Elland Road. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal goal kick.
Throw-in for Arsenal in the half of Leeds.
In the minute 78, Corner awarded to Arsenal.
Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
Great shot from Leeds's Rodrigo Moreno but he is denied by the crossbar.
In the minute 80, It's a goal kick for the away team in Leeds.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Leeds make their second substitution with Ian Poveda replacing Jack Harrison.
In the minute 82, Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (Arsenal) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Anthony Taylor signals a Arsenal throw-in in Leeds's half.
Anthony Taylor awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 83, Leeds drives forward and Ian Poveda gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Arsenal's Bukayo Saka gets in a shot on goal at Elland Road. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Arsenal have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
In the minute 85, Leeds awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Arsenal capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Liam Cooper (Leeds) has received a yellow card from Anthony Taylor.
In the minute 87, Leeds apply pressure at Elland Road and Patrick Bamford goes close with a header against the post.
Anthony Taylor waits before resuming play because Bernd Leno for Arsenal is still down.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Anthony Taylor.
Bernd Leno for Arsenal is back on the field again.
At Elland Road the fourth official shows that 5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Mateusz Klich for Leeds gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Arsenal have a goal kick.
Anthony Taylor signals a free kick to Arsenal.
Leeds drive into the zone and Raphinha is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leeds.
Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
That's full-time at Elland Road. The final score is 0-0.
Bukayo Saka is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Mikel Arteta (Arsenal) is making a third change, with Ainsley Maitland-Niles replacing the possibly injured Bukayo Saka.
At Elland Road, Kalvin Phillips has been yellow-carded for the home team.
